history.content: I'm staying just one or two nights in Amsterdam and want a no-frills hotel that's reliable and not overpriced. Any suggestions?

Based on your preferences for a no-frills hotel that is reliable and not overpriced, I would suggest considering **The Modern Hideaway**. It offers a great location near Zuid neighborhood, which is convenient for exploring the city. While it does offer some basic amenities like room service, terrace, garden, free billiards, and a hot tub, it also provides reliable Wi-Fi working most of the time and has an ideal location for those looking to explore Amsterdam.
Do you think The Modern Hideaway meets my needs? I'm particularly interested in its proximity to the Zuid neighborhood.

Yes, The Modern Hideaway seems to meet your needs quite well. Its proximity to the Zuid neighborhood makes it a convenient choice for exploring Amsterdam. However, keep in mind that while it offers some basic amenities, it might not have all the extras you're looking for, especially regarding Wi-Fi reliability and other modern conveniences.
Thank you, that was very helpful. That's all I needed, goodbye.
